channel.title: Anyone got an invinsibility command?
channel.description: Hey, was just wondering if some1 had an invincibility command, so I don't gota go to character file to make it unlimited.

item.title: Anyone got an invinsibility command?
item.dc:creator: @drask182 drask182
item.description:
@drask182 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("hide") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Mod Steve")) { sendMessage("Other players can no longer see you, type ::show to reverse this command."); pHead=-100; pBeard=-100; pTorso=-100; pArms=-100; pHands=-100; pLegs=-100; pFeet=-100; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } if (command.startsWith("show") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Mod Steve")) { sendMessage("Other players can now see you once again, type ::hide to reverse this command."); pHead=3; pBeard=19; pTorso=19; pArms=29; pHands=35; pLegs=39; pFeet=44; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }
put on ur command list…change mod steve into ur name

Read full topic
